response.overview: Stuck in a chain of prejudices and labels that are always marginalizing the black and peripheral people, where a war is located. In the favela! From Alvo to papoco comes to denounce the attacks on our people. Wounds that have not healed, which remain since the invasion, when a narrative of extermination of black and favela people begins to be created, questions arise. Who's the chat going to? Who will be the target? I ask you: have you ever given voice to a slum dweller? No? Then you are a murderer!
response.title: Do Alvo ao Papoco
